review: Friendly doctor. Easy to explain the issue . Can communicate easily. Good to meet her. Low wait time.

I had issue with my periods and doctor suggested me to do blood test and also pelvis scan once my period is over . she charged me ₹500. I got the tests done  and went to her with the reports , she consulted me and asked me to pay ₹300 , I asked her for checking reports why we need to pay again , she mentioned that because I have spent time reviewing the report and prescribing you medicine you need to pay. I was bit surprised as she had only asked me for the test and reports ** ********* *** **** * ***** ** ********* ** ******** *********** *** ** **** ** *** ***** *** ********* ********** ***** ******* ****** *** ********  ******** ** **** ** ***** ***** **** ** ********
The doctor quickly dismissed my queries and did not take time to comfort me, she very quickly went to other patients.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Trust is the most important factor for any doctor.  Madam gained the trust of many people by her years of experience , expertise and friendliness
